resumeJson.about: Passionate software developer with a focus on backend technologies. Dedicated to building impactful software solutions. Committed to continuous learning and sharing knowledge.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer at AwardMaven (July 2023 - now) - Remote
experiences.description: a CMS platform that connects sales teams with customers and vendors through legal documents and actionable workflows.
responsibilities: Partnered with product and sales to solve workflow issues via system design.
Developed a Generator tool that increased designer speed by 3x by automating repetitive tasks, enhancing customer experience and efficiency.
Enabled customers to instantly update their orders for corrections or data replacements, reducing the required human resources by 20% in the sales and design teams
Created a self customer checkout and order management system with task automation and WordPress integration, significantly boosting the sales team's performance.

experiences.title: Back End Developer at JackWestin.com (May 2022 - May 2023) - Remote
experiences.description: JackWestin is a high-traffic LMS platform where students prepare for exams using interactive courses, practice exams, and flashcards.
responsibilities: Implemented features inspired by popular software like Anki, enhancing user experience.
Optimized database queries, refactored code, and ensured high-quality testing.
Dockerized Laravel application, accelerated local environment setup, and maintained Stripe payment system.

experiences.title: Backend Developer at Signalads.com (Oct 2021 - May 2022) - Hybrid
responsibilities: Refactored and optimized SMS broker system, analyzing structure and database design. Utilized RabbitMQ and Laravel Queue for a high-performance system.
Maintained and optimized GraphQL codebase, improving database queries, resolving N+1 issues, and ensuring comprehensive testing.

Contributed to the company's Agile development process and facilitated communication between the development team and non-technical stakeholders. Helped ensure that the team was aligned with company goals and objectives.
